flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction:
Tis guide shows you a step by step guide to building your own table-top Nostalgic 1920s radio. The project consists of 3 parts:

  • An FM Radio Receiver
  • An Amplifier
  • An Enclosure

You can use the built in FM receiver, or plug in your own MP3 player. This radio can be used as a conversation piece and furniture too. Have fun!
